title: Thin italic slab serif
content:
After looking through MyFonts without any luck, im in desperate need for help with this.

Any one out there who can help a graphic designer in despair?

Font: 

 Marian 1800 italic 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145142/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145142/http:/typophile.com/files/image_232.jpg) | 113.48 KB |
author: AnnikaS

comments.content:
Marian (1800 Italic) by Commercial Type:  
 [https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/marian/marian/1800\_italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145142/https:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/marian/marian/1800_italic "https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/marian/marian/1800\_italic")

MyFonts’ WhattheFont search engine only recognizes fonts it sells (Marian is only available directly from Commercial), and even then WTF often struggles to accurately identify a typeface....

The website of the typeface designer:  
 [http://www.moderntypography.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145142/http:/www.moderntypography.com/index.html "http://www.moderntypography.com/index.html")
Thanks a lot! Looked at Marian, but didnt see that exact cut.
